net.datacrow.core

Class UserMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.datacrow.core.UserMode

  • public abstract class UserMode
extends java.lang.Object
    The user mode determines which actions are available to the user. A beginner might feel overwhelmed and therefore less features will be available to this user.
    Author:
    Robert Jan van der Waals

      • getUserMode

        public static int getUserMode()
        Returns the current selecte user mode / experience level
        Returns:

      • isCorrectXpLevel

        public static boolean isCorrectXpLevel(int level)
        Checks if the supplied user level corresponds with the current user mode.
        Parameters:
        level - the level to check (_XP_BEGINNER or _XP_EXPERT)
        Returns:
        level matches with the current experience level / user mode
